title: Drawing, "Design for a Monogram: N. R.", ca. 1920–40
medium: Pen and brush and black ink, graphite on cream illustration board
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite at lower right corner: N. R.; at upper right corner: 927
creditline: Gift of John Finguerra in memory of his brother Jim Finguerra
description:
Monogram composed of a solid black "R" above a solid black "N" separated by a thin black zig-zag line.
On verso, upside down, a Canson and Montgolfier label (Carson Lavie B).
Puiforcat fabrication #:
